subtitle: in 1963 a sweeping survey was conducted
in the southeastern region of turkey
which included a site known as Gobekli
Tepe or belly Hill and at the top of
this hill researchers found broken slabs
of limestone strewn in every direction
curious as this was researchers believe
the site to be a little more than a
medieval Cemetery so they simply made a
note of it and moved on
it was not until 1994 that the site
would be Revisited by a German
archaeologist named Klaus Schmidt during
his own survey of sites in the region
unlike those before him he did not
simply make note of gobedli Tepe and
move on instead he immediately believed
the sight to be something special far
from merely a medieval Cemetery
according to Schmidt it was clear right
away this was a gigantic Stone Age site
as research began Schmidt would be
proven correct and in fact it would go
much further than even he imagined
buried below the surface of the Hill
were a series of megaliths up to 18 feet
tall and weighing as much as 50 tons
arranged in circular patterns and
covered in detail carvings of humanoid
figures animals and Abstract symbols
even more important and more astonishing
the site was carbon dated at between
9600 to 8200 BCE making it at least 5
000 years older than Stonehenge simply
gobegli Tepe was home to the world's
oldest known megaliths

but in fact in 2017 two scientists came

that year chemical Engineers Martin
swetman and Demetrios secretsis began
examining gobegli tepe's famous vulture
Stone a pillar intricately carved with
depictions of different animals figures
and Designs which had long puzzle

encoding some kind of information and
upon closer examination they thought
they knew what that information was
they proposed that the animals depicted

representations of ancient

lupus and so on each arranged around a

representing the Sun
in this way Sweatman and socritis
believed that the vulture Stone provided

but what could this event have been
Sweatman and socritis believe the

that too
they declared that the series of square
symbols near the top of the pillar with

represented the fragments of a comet

while the headless man in the bottom

as they proposed in their seminal

date according to the alignment of the

using computer software Sweatman and
socritis had determined three times in
the past in which the constellations
were aligned as depicted on the vulture
Stone 4350 BCE 10 950 BCE and 18 000 BCE

something called the younger driest
event
younger dryas was a 1300 year event

of the earth into Ice Age conditions
geological and archaeological records
show that this period was one of
terrifying destruction across the globe
a time of super tsunamis and mass

out the Sun
a period of worldwide animal extinctions
